description: Admin login page with embedded PHP for session handling and authentication against a MySQL database.

methods.name: session_start
methods.description: Starts a new session or resumes an existing one.

methods.name: mysqli_connect
methods.description: Establishes a new connection to the MySQL server.

methods.name: mysqli_query
methods.description: Performs a query against the database.

methods.name: mysqli_num_rows
methods.description: Returns the number of rows in a result set.

methods.name: mysqli_fetch_array
methods.description: Fetches a result row as an associative array.

methods.name: header
methods.description: Sends a raw HTTP header to redirect to another page.
